name: Random Numbers 003 - Happy Randomness
description:
I have always loved the smiley face. Before emojis essentially made it a speech substitute, it was created in 1963 to boost staff moral at the State Mutual Life Assurance Company in Worcester, Mass. I hope this improves your moral. Can you see the after-image once the smiley is removed? Could you see it beforehand? 
___
Medium: Spreadsheet | Random Number Generator | Autoformatting
Method: Autoformatting black for numbers between x & y and yellow for numbers < x. Smile and eyes intentionally positioned and composed of constrained random numbers. 
Non auto-generated - each screen is manually generated and then edited together. 
___
This is the fourth in a series of "Random Number Generated Art". Find me on Twitter if you liked it.
